channel.title: Blog on R Dyer
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on R Dyer

item.title: Always already begun
item.description:
Starting a blog in the middle of brain fog feels intimidating â€“ I am more aware of the gap than the meaning.

Before my first friend died, I made more art than music (pencil to paper is a line uninterruptible, it seemed?) and sharing

Both the act of making and the image itself felt like a safer world to the spidery lines of speech, liable to drift
